statements: UPDATE virtual_merchandise_inventory SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE virtual_merchandise_inventory SET category = 'Electronics', quantity = 20, price = 49.99 WHERE name = 'Smart Watch';

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, price = 15.99 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = 20, sale_amount = 300.50 WHERE transaction_id = 201
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = 29.99 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = 20, sale_amount = 399.99, sale_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE transaction_id = 202
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET total_price = 150.50, quantity_sold = 5 WHERE sale_id = 10;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 10, total_price = total_price + 50 WHERE sale_id = 201;
UPDATE merchandise SET price = 29.99, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE merchandise_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin', email = 'admin@example.com', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-543212345678';
UPDATE merchandise SET name = 'New Product Name', price = 39.99, quantity = 100 WHERE merchandise_id = '4a2abd84-6e98-40f5-b9cb-e2c61e421a04';

UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE Sales SET total_amount = quantity_sold * price WHERE item_id = 2 AND sale_date = '2022-01-01';
